item.title: Centos 7 Firewalld masquerade
item.description: Firewalld masquerade firewall-cmd --get-active-zones firewall-cmd --list-all --zone=public firewall-cmd --add-masquerade --zone=public --permanent firewall-cmd --reload firewall-cmd --list-all --zone=public Referensi: https://myredhatcertification.wordpress.com/2015/04/26/firewalld-masquerade-forwarding-transparent-proxy/
